Performance IntelligencenbspAVEVAs comprehensive portfolio enables more than 20000 industrial enterprises to engineer smarter operate better and drive sustainable efficiency AVEVA supports customers through a trusted ecosystem that includes 5500 partners and 5700 certified developers around the world The company is headquartered in Cambridge UK with over 6500 employees and 90 offices in over 40 countries Learn more at wwwavevacomnbspppbrppstrongRESPONSIBILITIES You will dostrongppbrpp Concur System Administrator who will be accountable for application delivery and technical support of SAP Concur Travel amp Expense system to meet operational objectives and strategic business initiativespp Managing and configuring SAP Concur SAAS system including Test and Production environmentspp Provide 2nd line support for business user issue working closely with AP and AMS to resolve issuespp Troubleshoot and resolve issues in a timely manner with oversight and coordination with the AMS providerpp Ensure integrations to and from Concur run successfully including managing of error log resolutionpp Work with vendor technical consultants for configuration of Concur and issue resolution as neededpp Maintain system accounts to include account creation changes and deletion of Concur profiles and user roles ensuring the safeguard the security integrity and confidentiality of datapp Update the Concur system to fix defects or to complete minor enhancement requestspp Maintain the design documentation that reflects changes made to the application Includes descriptions of workflows scripts system configuration and design work view process flow and functionpp Develop and implement procedures for Concur travel expense and purchasing credit card management and administration in compliance with company policiesppbrppstrongQualifications You will havestrongpulli2 years of experience in SAP Concur system administration designconfiguration and support specific to Travel Request and Expense moduleslili Technical and functional knowledge on Concur Financial  Expense Systemlili Proficiency using MS Excel MS Access SQL Visual Basic MS PowerPoint MS Project MS
